answers.answer: I was induced, and ive got to tell you everybody is different i know but me personally think theres nothing wrong with being induced mine went by really quick they had me take the pill to induce me about one hr later my water broke as soon as that happened my contractions started and then i was already delivering my baby! Ohh but yeahh the contractions are actually stronger more painful because they r being forced by inducing you :(.....My labor was 6hrs long that was it! I was soo happy cuz it went by soo fast compared to others that labor last for hrs & hrs or even days :\  & well as soon as a pushed my bby & the placenta i felt great i felt soo relax since i had her all natural without epidural or anything i felt great i wasnt feeling drowsy or anything just tired from the pushing..but besides that everything was great! :)

Thank you! I hope mine goes as well as yours! This is my first child and he is measuring big because I had gotten gestational diabetes:/ so if my delivery goes as well as yours it would be a blessing!

No problem :) glad it helped make u feel a bit better jst dont be scared everything will be alright just be positive about it! Best of luck to you & ur bby!:) keep us updated after ur delivery id like to know how it went ;)

question: So if my little man doesn't come naturally by this Tuesday my doc is going to induce me. I've been completely shut no dilation or effeacment:( I'm scared that the induction won't go well and will be painful or end up with a c section with I am really trying to avoid!Any mommas got stories of their induction?Ive tried primrose oil, bouncing on an exercise ball, walking, raspberry leaf tea, and my husband and I haven't stopped having sex... so what else am j missing!
title: scared about induction:/
